LanguageData.AuxiliaryAI_Sharpshooter.label: auxiliary AI (sharpshooter)
LanguageData.AuxiliaryAI_Sharpshooter.description: A specialized combat AI assistant system designed for greatly increasing the user's accuracy, favouring long distance weaponry. Due to the sophisticated nature of the system that focuses and streamlines most cerebral processes, it cannot be used with other auxiliary AI.

LanguageData.AuxiliaryAI_Brawler.label: auxiliary AI (brawler)
LanguageData.AuxiliaryAI_Brawler.description: A specialized AI system designed for combat purposes, aiding the user by filtering irrelevant electrical and chemical signals sent to the brain in high-threat situations, thereby increasing overall combat capabilities.
